name: Trois Petits Chats
description:
A small edutainment game to learn French on the dorica castra "Trois Petits Chats".

Developer: Meowdoleon
Original Music Composition: Travadja la moukère, interpreted by Meowdoleon on the Violin.

Uses the work from:
Rachel Fisher: Yes? (CC BY-SA 2.0), modified.
Christian Holmér: Kittens (CC BY 2.0), modified.
Dave Raggett: Adding alpha channels or chroma keys to JPEG images (CC BY 3.0), modified.
pouringmyartout: Dancing cat!!! (CC BY 3.0), modified.
pngimg: Lobster claw PNG image with transparent background (CC BY-NC 4.0) / Rotated, resized and red filter applied.
